summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the construction of improvements relating to the operation of streetcars along Alaskan Way from South Washington Street to Broad Street (Alaskan Way Streetcar Project; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Fund; and providing for an advance to the Transit Fund and the payment thereof.
